product_name: Ruffwear Bark'n Boot Liners - Set of 4
long_description: The Ruffwear Bark'n Boot liners enhance fit, performance and comfort for happy paws! Designed for use with Ruffwear Grip Trex boots (sold separately) to enhance boot fit and comfort. Durable double-knit material wicks moisture in warm weather and insulates in cold. Reinforced toe box and cuff helps protect paws from abrasion and irritation. Stretchy design with snug-fitting cuff makes liners easy to put on and take off.
short_description: The Ruffwear Bark'n Boot liners enhance fit, performance and comfort for happy paws!
